original_text: Then the Lord will ask his people, ‘Why could your gods not help you? Those were the gods that you thought would keep you safe. Then the Lord will ask his people, ‘Why could your gods not help you? Those were the gods that you thought would keep you safe. Then the Lord will ask his people, ‘Why could your gods not help you? Those were the gods that you thought would keep you safe. Then the Lord will ask his people, ‘Why could your gods not help you? Those were the gods that you thought would keep you safe. Then the Lord will ask his people,
korean_text: 또한 그가 말씀하시기를 그들의 신들이 어디 있으며 그들이 피하던 반석이 어디 있느냐

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord will ask his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 주께서 그의 백성에게 물으실 것이다

sentences.original_text: Why could your gods not help you?
sentences.korean_translation: 어째서 너희의 신들이 너희를 도와주지 못했는가?

sentences.original_text: that you thought would keep you safe
